name: Deception (itch) (GamerKing885, og.creations, alexkarate)
description:
Made for the Community Game Jam within 7 days.

A Third-Person RPG with no violence and enemies made by GamerKing885, Alexkarate and OlderGods Studios.

Credits:
https://alexkarate.itch.io/
https://ogcreations.itch.io/

Game/level design - GamerKing885
Programming, 3D modeling -Alexkarate (https://alexkarate.itch.io/)
Music, SFX - OlderGods Studios (https://ogcreations.itch.io/, https://www.oldergods.ca)

Please Download the Final build as it fixes a major bug which prevents enemies from attacking. (Archiving the old build)
